item.g:title: Advanced Chatbot Package
item.g:description: A next-level AI chatbot solution designed for businesses that require smarter automation, advanced lead handling, and personalized customer interactions . This chatbot goes beyond basic responses by adapting to customer inputs, managing follow-ups, and providing AI-driven insights to optimize engagement and conversions. ✔ First Payment: $2,550 (Includes a $1,750 setup fee + first-month chatbot service) ✔ Ongoing Monthly Payment: $800 (Starting from Month 2)

item.g:description: A high-performance PPC management service designed for businesses with larger ad budgets looking to scale results, optimize conversions, and maximize ROI . This package includes everything in the Basic PPC Ad Management package , plus advanced targeting, A/B testing, and strategic ad creative development to increase engagement and conversions . ✔ Price: $1,500/month + $750 setup fee ✔ For Ad Budgets Between: $2,000 – $10,000 ✔ 1 Advertising Platform: Google Ads OR Meta Ads ✔ Minimum Commitment: 3 Months

item.g:title: Advanced SEO Package
item.g:description: Step up your SEO game with our Advanced SEO Package, designed for growing businesses that need more strategic support. This mid-tier plan includes targeted keyword growth , a tailored content roadmap, and data-driven reporting to help your brand gain consistent, long-term visibility. ✔ First Payment: $2,150 (Includes a $750 setup fee + first-month SEO service) ✔ Ongoing Monthly Payment: $1,400 (Starting from Month 2) ✔ No long-term commitment – cancel anytime

Designed to automate business tasks, manage scheduling, and handle administrative work , this AI assistant improves efficiency and ensures seamless customer interactions across multiple platforms. ✔ Ongoing Monthly Payment: $2,600 ✔ Minimum Commitment: 3 Months

item.g:title: Business Growth Package
item.g:description: The Growth Package is designed for businesses ready to scale their brand, expand their online presence, and enhance their marketing efforts . This comprehensive package includes a fully responsive multi-page website, advanced branding, in-depth SEO, and social media setup, giving you the foundation needed to grow your business effectively. ✔ $5,999 – Complete Business Growth Package ✔ Website, Branding, SEO, Social Media & Marketing Setup ✔ Designed for Business Expansion & Online Visibility Optional Monthly Services (If Hosted by Us): Website Maintenance – $15/month (Updates, security, and minor changes) cPanel Email & Web Hosting – $20/month SSL Certificate – $10/month (Purchase, installation, and maintenance) Google Workspace / Gmail – $10/user per month (Additional users: $10/month) Domain Renewal: $150 (Every 2 years) Platforms Available: Wix Studio, WordPress or Webflow

item.g:description: The Launch Package is the perfect all-in-one business startup solution , providing you with everything needed to establish your brand, website, and marketing presence . item.g:title: Business Scale Package

This package includes a custom-built multi-page website (with optional eCommerce integration), a premium branding suite, advanced SEO strategies, and high-level marketing tools . With link-building strategies, and legal branding considerations , this package is ideal for companies looking to scale aggressively and establish authority in their industry . ✔ $9,999 – The Ultimate Business Growth Package ✔ Website, Premium Branding, SEO, & Marketing ✔ Perfect for businesses ready to expand & scale efficiently Monthly Services Website Maintenance – $30/month (Updates, security, and minor changes) SSL Certificate – $10/month (Purchase, installation, and maintenance) Google Workspace / Gmail – $10/user per month (Additional users: $10/month) Domain Renewal : $150 (Every 2 years) Platforms Available : Shopify, Wix Studios, WordPress or Webflow (extra fees may apply)

item.g:title: Custom AI Solutions

item.g:title: Custom Brochures
item.g:description: Our brochure design and printing services provide professionally designed, high-quality marketing materials tailored to your business needs. Whether you need design-only or full-service printing , we offer a variety of sizes, fold types, and finishes to enhance your brand presentation . ✔ Custom Brochure Design & Printing ✔ Choice of Gloss or Matte Finish ✔ Roll Fold or Z Fold for 6-Page Brochures ✔ Flexible Print Quantities (100 - 5000 copies) Custom Brochure Printing Only This option is available for those supplying print-ready PDF artwork or requesting a reprint of a previously designed brochure . If you already have a designer or artwork on file, we will ensure it is checked and approved for high-quality printing . If your file is not print-ready or requires layout modifications , an artwork fee of $100 will apply.

item.g:title: Custom Envelopes
item.g:description: Professionally designed and printed envelopes that reflect your brand’s identity and maintain professionalism across all correspondence. If you already have a designer or artwork on file, we will ensure it is checked and approved for high-quality printing . If your file is not print-ready or requires layout modifications , an artwork fee of $100 will apply.

item.g:title: Custom Web Design & Development
item.g:description: Your business needs more than a template. Our team delivers custom web design and development that is fast, SEO friendly and scalable. We plan information architecture, design UI and engineer clean code with performance best practices. Based in Sydney, we build headless CMS sites, custom components and integrations for bookings, payments and CRM . Launch a secure, maintainable website that reflects your brand and lifts conversions. ✔ Custom Quote – Pricing Based on Scope & Features ✔ Platform Options to Suit Your Business Needs ✔ Optimized for Speed, SEO & User Experience Platform Options (Monthly maintenance costs may vary based on the platform selected.) Webflow – Best for visually stunning, high-performance websites with complete design flexibility. Shopify – Ideal for eCommerce businesses , providing seamless online store functionality. WordPress – Highly scalable and flexible , perfect for businesses needing diverse features. Wix – Beginner-friendly website management , great for businesses that need easy updates.

item.g:title: Premium Business Cards
item.g:description: Elevate your brand with luxurious premium business cards that make a lasting impression. Printed on ultra-thick 450gsm stock with a smooth velvet laminate and striking scodix embellishment, these cards are perfect for professionals looking to stand out. ✔ 450gsm Heavyweight Card ✔ Velvet Laminate on Both Sides ✔ Scodix Raised Gloss Finish on One Side ✔ Exceptional Quality & Durability ✔ Perfect for Premium Branding Pricing & Options Printing Prices (Print-Only vs. Design + Print) Quantities x 1 kind ✔ 250 Business Cards – Print Only: $200 | Design + Print: $320 ✔ 500 Business Cards – Print Only: $250 | Design + Print: $370 ✔ 1,000 Business Cards – Print Only: $300 | Design + Print: $420 Quantities x 2 kinds ✔ 250 Business Cards – Print Only: $350 | Design + Print: $450 ✔ 500 Business Cards – Print Only: $420 | Design + Print: $540 ✔ 1,000 Business Cards – Print Only: $520 | Design + Print: $640 Quantities x 3 kinds ✔ 250 Business Cards – Print Only: $500 | Design + Print: $600 ✔ 500 Business Cards – Print Only: $600 | Design + Print: $720 ✔ 1,000 Business Cards – Print Only: $740 | Design + Print: $860 Quantities x 4 kinds ✔ 250 Business Cards – Print Only: $620 | Design + Print: $740 ✔ 500 Business Cards – Print Only: $780 | Design + Print: $900 ✔ 1,000 Business Cards – Print Only: $950 | Design + Print: $1070 Quantities x 5 kinds ✔ 250 Business Cards – Print Only: $750 | Design + Print: $870 ✔ 500 Business Cards – Print Only: $940 | Design + Print: $1060 ✔ 1,000 Business Cards – Print Only: $1160 | Design + Print: $1280 Reorder or Printing Only – Important Information Only select this option if you meet the following criteria: ✔ We have previously created your business card artwork, and you require a reprint. ✔ You have a graphic designer and can supply print-ready artwork based on the specifications below. Print-Ready Artwork Requirements ✔ File Format: PDF or EPS (Vector Format) ✔ Color Mode: CMYK (No RGB or Spot Colors) ✔ Bleed: 3mm on all sides ✔ Safe Area: Keep important text and logos at least 5mm from the trim edge ✔ Resolution: 300 DPI or higher ✔ Fonts: All fonts must be outlined or embedded

item.g:title: One Page Website & Landing Page Design

Print-Ready Artwork Requirements ✔ File Format: PDF or EPS (Vector Format) ✔ Color Mode: CMYK (No RGB or Spot Colors) ✔ Bleed: 3mm on all sides ✔ Safe Area: Keep important text and logos at least 5mm from the trim edge ✔ Resolution: 300 DPI or higher ✔ Fonts: All fonts must be outlined or embedded
